topics.body:
So Tumblr in my opinion has beaten youtube in the "Site gets worse every update" Game.

Tumblr runs like complete shit on IE now. Like I'm an IE kid. Grew up with IE so I stick with it. 

And Tumblr just with every update makes it almost impossible to be used on IE and its TERRIBLE.

Like they added some new functions that you can do with your posts like make Youtube video's look tiny and all that.

Well I try to reblog those post but I cant! for some reason when using IE those post never Load when reblog so you end up having to refresh it!
